title: Handle Customer Data Privacy Request (GDPR/CCPA)
description: A customer submits a formal request to see all the personal data the company has stored about them.

tasks.description: Verify the identity of the person making the request to ensure they are the actual customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent follows a strict identity verification process.

tasks.description: Query all relevant databases (CRM, order system, marketing platform) for any data linked to the customer's identity.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all personal data fragments from various systems.

tasks.description: Compile the data into a human-readable report and send it securely to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates and delivers the data portability report.
